title: [Question]LAPTOP USE AND SPECIFICATION
content: I am a CSE&AIML student in EC campus so I just wanted to know how frequent we are supposed to bring laptop and what is the specification required

comments.body: joining ec cse as well, I am toh bringing a normal laptop which can handle moderate amount of task

you don't have to bring it a lot during the first year- just in the c/python classes if the teacher allows it- for other subjects, just occasionally maybe to complete an assignment or some presentation, which again depends on the teacher.
